title: Chhota Bheem & Krishna: Pataliputra- City of the Dead
short_cast: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Arun Shekher, Sanchit Wartak
cast: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Arun Shekher, Sanchit Wartak
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: Krishna needs Bheem’s help: The ruined city of Pataliputra has been cursed! Can the friends do what it takes to bring light back into this town?
